data.title: File mover licenses, buy Limagito filemover software
data.meta_description: Buy file mover licenses now, our licensing types are simple. Try out Limagito filemover with the free Lite version available.
data.text:
https://limagito.com/limagitox-file-mover-license-types/

For the Limagito file mover software is a Lite+, Single+, Site+ and Corporate+ License available. The Lite+ version is free, but all options are available, so you can fully evaluate our product before purchasing. A Single+ License grants you the right to install and use Limagito file mover on a single machine within and used by your organization. A Single+ User License key is generated for a specific hostname (= not transferable). A Site+ License allows you the right to install and use Limagito file mover across multiple machines within and used by your organization at 1 site (physical site or geographic location) of your organization. A Corporate+ License allows you the right to install and use Limagito file mover across multiple machines within and used by your organization at a max. of 5 physical sites or geographic locations of your organization. These licenses cannot be transferred between ‘organizations’.

None of these File Mover Licenses allows you to redistribute our software or to use our software as “SaaS”. We offer a special Redistribution+ license that allows other “service providers”/”developers”/”integrators” to use our file mover software as “SaaS” or to include with their own products. With this license you can add our file mover within your own product/service either as “SaaS” or “On-Premise” installation. Please contact us for more information.

Don’t forget to read our “privacy and refund policy” at the bottom of this page!

GDPR

Verifone (Avangate- 2Checkout) is an authorized reseller for goods and services provided by Limagito.com. Starting May 25th Verifone (Avangate – 2Checkout) will be GDPR compliant.

FastSpring is an authorized reseller for goods and services provided by Limagito.com. Starting May 25th FastSpring will be GDPR compliant.

Limagito X file mover license file

After payment you will receive a License.xml file by email. We typically process most orders within a few hours. However in some cases it can take up to 2 business days. If you didn’t receive this email then please check your spam filter first. Subject of our email will contain: ‘… License version LimagitoX incl License.xml’. The customer is responsible for keeping a copy of the installer and License file.

Privacy and refund policy

Privacy Policy: Any personal information received will only be used to fill your order. We will not sell or redistribute your information to anyone.

Refund Policy: We provide a free Lite version to let you fully evaluate our product(s) before purchasing. Unlike physical goods, electronically distributed software and software licenses can be duplicated. Once a license has been issued, it is unfortunately not possible for us to recall all copies. Therefore, Limagito.com does not accept product returns or exchanges. It is your responsibility to familiarize yourself with this refund policy. By placing an order, you are supposed to have read this refund policy, agreed with and fully accepted the terms of this refund policy. If you do not agree with or fully accept the terms of this refund policy, please do not purchase our product.

Physical Address: Hasselt, BEL
